heading:
Reading : Rainbow

The Rainbow reading can say something about what the questioner really wants, how to get there and what to expect along the way there.

This reading does not have an expiry date, but is best drawn only once per 2 or 3 months. Drawing it more often may result in the same message from the cards.

You do not need to ask a question before drawing this reading.

cards.readingSpotExplanation: Card 2 describes what the force behind your desires is.
Card 3 describes what the most difficult obstacle is along your way to fulfillment of your desires.
Card 4 describes what you have to let go of to fulfill your desire.
Card 5 describes how you are acting at the moment in relation to your desire.
Card 6 describes how you could best achieve your desire.
